member.name: T:MassTransit.NewId
member.summary: A NewId is a type that fits into the same space as a Guid/Uuid/uniqueidentifier, but is guaranteed to be both unique and ordered, assuming it is generated using a single instance of the generator for each network address used.

member.name: M:MassTransit.NewId.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a NewId using the specified byte array.
